lead_paragraph: Shares of Sarepta Therapeutics soared after the Food and Drug Administration approved its drug Exondys 51, a treatment for a type of muscular dystrophy.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Teeters as Investors Await Fed’s Decision
headline.main: Wall St. Teeters as Investors Await Fed’s Decision on Rates

snippet: Shares of Sarepta Therapeutics soared after the Food and Drug Administration approved its drug Exondys 51, a treatment for a type of muscular dystrophy....
abstract: Stocks finish mostly lower, as investors wait for word from central bank meetings in United States and Japan on interest rates.
